item.title: Thinking in `highcharter` - How to build any Highcharts plot in R
item.author: danton.noriega@gmail.com (Danton Noriega)
item.description: Goal of this Post What I will not cover Prerequisites Series: highcharter and Highcharts building blocks Series in highcharter are a list of lists with a specific structure hc_add_series_list() vs hc_add_series() Highcharts API and highcharter functions Just throw an hc_ infront of it Use hchart() with Tidy Data Your Best Friend, the hc$x$hc_opts$series List One-dimensional array?
